reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter makeup kit
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved it. She is doing makeup tutorials, so I will be placing more makeup orders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So many colors
reviews.reviewText: This is awesome. So many colors to try and they look great. I received this same day as was having a couple friends over for wine and it was like we reverted to teenagers again trying everything out in this kit :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Charmcode makeup kit has everything you need for your makeup, including 54 matte and eyeshadow colors, 4 blushes, 3 highlighters, 4 eyebrow powders, 4 cream eyeliners, 7 concealers, 15 lip colors, 1 lip gloss, and 1 mascara. It also comes with 5 makeup brushes. However, it doesn't include a stiff eyebrow brush, which I wish it did. The kit is compact and condensed, but not suitable for traveling as it's too big and overwhelming. It may also be too much for beginners. The eye makeup applies smoothly and lasts all day without smudging, and the mascara doesn't clump. Overall, it offers good value for the price and reasonable quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Many Colors to Choose From
reviews.reviewText: The Charmcode makeup kit has almost everything you need in a makeup kit. It has 54 color matte and eyeshadows, 4 blushes, 3 highlighters, 4 eyebrow powders, 4 cream eyeliners, 7 concealers, 15 lip colors, 1 lip gloss and 1 mascara. It also comes with 5 makeup brushes. The one thing I would have liked to see included is a stiff eyebrow brush.The kit is condensed as much as possible and quite compact for the amount of makeup it has in it but it is not in my opinion for traveling. It is too large and I do not think that I would need all of the selection on vacation. Also I think it would be a little overwhelming to the beginner.The eye makeup itself goes on smoothly and stays in place all day. It can be removed with a pretreated makeup remover pad or two. The mascara does not clomp when applied. I really like it too.All in all it is a good value and reasonable quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has all I need.
reviews.reviewText: This CHARMCODE makeup kit is a nice addition to my makeup collection. I feel that it is perfect to take when traveling, it has a large variety of eye shadow colors and absolutely everything I may need for my makeup routine. The size is smaller than if I try to take with me what I use at home. The quality seems good, I do not need to reapply more often than what I normally do. I feel this kit works perfectly for me and what I need. I am pleased with this kit and I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Gift Set
reviews.reviewText: This comes in a very cute box that folds out into so many great color options! All the primary brushes you would need inside a compact box makes this an easy and attractive gift for teens and adults alike. Materials were decent quality and worked well. My wife was envious of how many color options there were.None of the photos lie--this comes very well packaged and everything is so securely shipped and covered; it has a premium feel about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A wide variety of colors
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the following item: CHARMCODE All in One Professional Makeup Gift Kit for Women Full Kit - Included 54 Eyeshadows Face Blusher Highlighter Eyebrow Makeup Brushes Contour Lip Gloss Mascara, Suitable for ChristmasThis make-up kit comes well packaged in a nice box, but unfortunately a very large address sticker was placed on the box so it could be shipped to me, making the box no longer giftable.The make-up comes in a foam padding inside the box. Once opened, there are 4 different levels of trays of make-up and brushes. Also lipstick, mascara and lip glosses.I feel this would be great for a teen just starting to use make-up. There are a lot of colors to choose from and experiment with. But each color is just a small amount, so it won't last long. There is no way of knowing what color you are using to order more. I don't even know if that is possible. So when the color is gone, it is gone unless you are going to purchase a complete new kit.This is quite large in size and no way would I consider this to be travel sized. It would take up a great deal of room in the suitcase or carry-on. And you can't take it with you to do any touch-ups if needed. So definitely not that convenient.But it is a great price for a lot of different colors for someone who is just starting out to learn how to apply make-up.So far there has been no skin irritation and I will update the review if that changes. I think this is a nice set for a young person, but no way do I feel this is a professional make-up kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great as a gift. I got this for my daughters birthday and its really nice. The price isnt too bad for the size of this kit. The quality isnt the best but the pigment is there. The brushes, i personally wouldnt use but the shades are very diverse and nice. Theres also a whole seperate layer for lips next to the mirror which is so cool! Would recommend
